queries.query: CREATE TABLE D_M${localChannelId} ( ID NUMBER(19) NOT NULL, SERVER_ID NVARCHAR2(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED_DATE TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, PROCESSED CHAR(1) DEFAULT '0' CHECK (PROCESSED IN ('0','1')) NOT NULL, ORIGINAL_ID NUMBER(19), IMPORT_ID NUMBER(19), IMPORT_CHANNEL_ID NVARCHAR2(36), CONSTRAINT D_M${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(ID) )
CREATE INDEX D_M${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_M${localChannelId}(ID, SERVER_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MM${localChannelId} ( ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID NUMBER(19) NOT NULL, SERVER_ID NVARCHAR2(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED_DATE TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, STATUS CHAR(1) NOT NULL, CONNECTOR_NAME NCLOB, SEND_ATTEMPTS NUMBER(10) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, SEND_DATE TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, RESPONSE_DATE TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, ERROR_CODE NUMBER(10) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, CHAIN_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, ORDER_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, ID), CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID, STATUS)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX2 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, SERVER_ID, ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MC${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID NUMBER(19) NOT NULL, CONTENT_TYPE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CONTENT NCLOB, IS_ENCRYPTED CHAR(1) DEFAULT '0' CHECK (IS_ENCRYPTED IN ('0','1')) NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE NVARCHAR2(255), CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID, CONTENT_TYPE), CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX D_MC${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MC${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID NUMBER(19) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID), CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE D_MA${localChannelId} ( ID NVARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID NUMBER(19) NOT NULL, TYPE NVARCHAR2(40), SEGMENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, ATTACHMENT_SIZE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CONTENT BLOB, CONSTRAINT D_MA${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )
CREATE INDEX D_MA${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MA${localChannelId}(ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MA${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MA${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MS${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID NUMBER(10), SERVER_ID NVARCHAR2(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, RECEIVED_LIFETIME NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, FILTERED NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, FILTERED_LIFETIME NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, SENT NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, SENT_LIFETIME NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, ERROR NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, ERROR_LIFETIME NUMBER(19) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL )
CREATE INDEX D_MS${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MS${localChannelId}(METADATA_ID, SERVER_ID)
CREATE SEQUENCE D_MSQ${localChannelId} START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1 NOCACHE

CREATE TABLE D_CHANNELS ( LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID NUMBER(19) NOT NULL, CHANNEL_ID NVARCHAR2(36) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_CHANNELS_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID), CONSTRAINT UNIQUE_CHANNEL_ID UNIQUE (CHANNEL_ID) )
DROP TABLE D_M${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MM${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MC${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MA${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MS${localChannelId}
DROP SEQUENCE D_MSQ${localChannelId}
DELETE FROM D_CHANNELS WHERE LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID = ${localChannelId}
SELECT D_MSQ${localChannelId}.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD ("${columnName}" VARCHAR2(255 CHAR))
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD ("${columnName}" NUMBER(31, 15))
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD ("${columnName}" CHAR(1))
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD ("${columnName}" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL)
UPDATE D_M${localChannelId} SET PROCESSED = 1 WHERE ID = ?
UPDATE D_M${localChannelId} SET PROCESSED = 0 WHERE ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_M${localChannelId}
SELECT M.* FROM D_M${localChannelId} M JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM ON MM.MESSAGE_ID = M.ID AND MM.ID = 0 WHERE M.PROCESSED = 0 AND MM.SERVER_ID = ? ORDER BY M.ID

SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} MM JOIN D_M${localChannelId} M ON M.ID = MM.MESSAGE_ID JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM0 ON MM0.MESSAGE_ID = MM.MESSAGE_ID AND MM0.ID = 0 WHERE M.PROCESSED = 0 AND MM0.SERVER_ID = ? ORDER BY M.ID, MM.ID
